title: Can someone give me a download link for the updated client LeagueClient.exe?
body:
LeagueClient.exe that opened the new client had somehow been deleted from my computer and I can't reinstall the new client to fix it, does anyone mind uploading their LeagueClient.exe to file server and giving it to me?

Its the client that's in [C:\Riot Games\League of Legends]

replies.body:
The patcher wouldn't recognize a copy like that, and would need to scan your game files and automatically perform repairs.  I also don't recommend locating specific files from unofficial resources, as that can be pretty risky.  The updated client should be available through another name in your same game directory, unless manual deletions were made.

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to run an automatic clean reinstall.

Let me know if that helps.
